    Nutanix â Why Work For Us?

    About Us

    • About Us
    • Careers
    • Grads & Interns
    • Inside Sales
    • Webscale Women

    It's official! We're proud to be named a Great Place to Work-Certified company!


    Nutanix makes infrastructure invisible, elevating IT to focus on the applications and services that power their business. The Nutanix enterprise cloud platform delivers the agility, pay-as-you-grow economics and operational simplicity of the public cloud, without sacrificing the predictability, security and control of on-premises infrastructure. Nutanix solutions leverage web-scale engineering and consumer-grade design to natively converge compute, virtualization and storage into a resilient, software-defined solution that delivers any application at any scale.

    Founded in 2009, and selling our first product in 2011 - Nutanix has experienced tremendous growth. We are in over 45 countries with more than 5,000 employees.Â Learn more at www.nutanix.com or on Twitter @nutanix.


    Read more


    Hungry. Humble. Honest.
    Our values form the foundation of who we are and how we operate every day around the world. They show up in our ambition to achieve our dreams, our courage to do what matters, and our tenacity to keep customers happy. At Nutanix, we prize those unique individuals who demonstrate empathy, respect differences, and appreciate others. If youâre authentic, credible and transparentâsomeone who walks your talk and thrives on collaborationâwe want you to join our team!Â 

    Be a part of building a company that is truly leading an IT revolution. We make infrastructure invisible, elevating IT to focus on the applications and services that power their business.Â Led by Dheeraj Pandey, one of CRNâs âTop 25 Innovators of 2016,â Nutanix welcomes big thinkers and budding entrepreneurs, those who are unafraid to take on seemingly impossible challenges and interested in learning how to build a business along the way.Â 

    Nutanix employees enjoy some amazing benefits and perks: free (yes, free!) healthcare, daily catered lunch and snacks aplenty, on-site massage, employee (and family) events, world renown speakers, training and development, and much more. Check out the photo gallery and #lifeatnutanix to see for yourself!


    Read more


    At Nutanix we truly believe that students and new graduates offer an innovative view to our technology and team. Fresh minds and those who are willing to push the envelope are going to launch our company further than the rest. We are committed to finding and hiring the best out there and it starts with you!

    Come join a fast growing company where you get to work with some of the top talent from around the valley to excel quickly, get your hands on the newest technologies, and ultimately learn what it takes to build a revolutionary business.


    Read more

    The Nutanix Inside Sales Team provides a unique opportunity for those with a passion in sales and a determination to grow their career. Our team provides a 4 tier structure, allowing people to grow from no experience to being ready to take on a role in field sales.Â 

    Sales Development Representatives are the first level, working closely with marketing to follow up on leads generated from events. You are given the chance to learn about the product, and different sales strategies to position the product.Â 

    Account Development Representatives focus on prospecting. A unique role focused on Global 2000s and truly getting Nutanix in front of the biggest customers out there. Winning in this role, means a huge win for the company.

    Inside Sale Represntative provides a blend of channel work and partnering along side field reps. You will get the chance to work with the channel partners in your region, bring in deals, develop relationships and ultimately drive business. In addition, you will work closely with the field to understand full sales cycles.

    Account Executives run full cycle sales deals from start to finish. This opportunity prepares you for a field position as you will manage all aspects of the deal. From here you can move easily to a field opportunity.Â 

    Nutanix Careers: An exclusive look at the inside sales team at Nutanix

    Read more

    Interviewing at Nutanix

    1. Dec 3, 2016

      Helpful (8) Â 

      Consulting Architect Interview

      Anonymous Employee in San Jose, CA
      Accepted Offer
      Positive Experience
      Difficult Interview

      Application

      I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4+ weeks. I interviewed at Nutanix (San Jose, CA) in November 2016.

      Interview

      Was a number of phone interviews and in-person interviews. Their lead recruiter was very responsive and as a team they did a fabulous job being uniform in the process and communication. Grade A people in their GSO organization and in their recruiting department.

      Interview Questions

      • Why are you considering the move? Â  3 Answers
      Nutanix 2016-12-03 11:09 PST
